name: UIAlertAction.Style
desc: Styles to apply to action buttons in an alert.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Apply the default style to the actionâ€™s button.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: Apply a style that indicates the action cancels the operation and leaves things unchanged.

items.name: case destructive
items.desc: Apply a style that indicates the action might change or delete data.
